page.title: 17Farming.Visits and Findings.
page.content: {FARM OWNER ACRES CATTLE MILK Fry's p.Hannam 185 100 2500g Goods M.Ralph 120 107 2400g Great House G Ralph 190 160 3200g Hawkers G.Lockyer 71 45 850g Jadewood G.Pavey 24.5 8 ? Manor Farm Todber R.Candy 225 280 4000g Pigeon House E.Gibbs 90 80 1250g Pigeon House D.Ames 108 117 1600g Shadehouse D.Ford 137 160 2100g Terrace C.Batten 173 117 1100g The 10 farmers own 31 tractors employ 19 workers.{MILK }is in gallons weekly Friesian cows 100% Dairy farming. Most of the milk is collected by tanker and taken to Wincanton.Computer feeding methods are used on 3 of the farms. Shadehouse Farm dates back to 1590. Great House and Goods Farm to early 17century.
